DOC.brief_summary: Studies animal suggest berry preparation anthocyanin-rich berry extract reduce body fatness . Previous study tea catechin , belong flavonoid class chemical anthocyanins , suggest compound alter fat oxidation , may mechanism body fatness influence anthocyanin intake . Well-controlled study human lack .
DOC.criteria: Younger 25 year old old 75 year old Female Use bloodthinning medication Coumadin ( warfarin ) , Dicumarol ( dicumarol ) , Miradon ( anisinidione ) Presence gastrointestinal disease , metabolic disease , malabsorption syndrome may interfere study goal Have pregnant previous 12 month , currently pregnant lactating , plan become pregnant study Type 2 diabetes require use oral antidiabetic agent insulin Fasting triglyceride great 300 mg/dL Fasting glucose great 126 mg/dL History eat disorder dietary pattern consistent dietary intervention ( e.g. , vegetarian , low fat diet , high protein diet ) Use prescription overthecounter antiobesity medication supplement ( e.g. , phenylpropanalamine , ephedrine , caffeine ) least 6 month prior start study history surgical intervention obesity Active cardiovascular disease ( heart attack procedure within past three month participation cardiac rehabilitation program within last three month , stroke , history/treatment transient ischemic attack past three month , document history pulmonary embolus past six month ) . Use tobacco product past 3 month Use oral IV antibiotic month precede study Unwillingness abstain herbal supplement two week prior study study Known ( selfreported ) allergy adverse reaction blackberry Unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff Selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past twelve month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( Longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol
